original_text: Jesus replied, ‘It will be very bad for you as well, teachers of God's Law. You give rules to people to obey. Those rules are like things that are too heavy for people to carry. You do not even help people to carry them. Not even with one finger do you help them!
korean_text: 이르시되 화 있을진저 또 너희 율법교사여 지기 어려운 짐을 사람에게 지우고 너희는 한 손가락도 이 짐에 대지 않는도다

sentences.original_text: ‘It will be very bad for you as well
You give rules to people to obey
that are too heavy for people to carry
You do not even help people to carry them
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 사람들이 그것들을 지도록 전혀 도와주지 않는다

sentences.original_text: Not even with one finger do you help them!
